plot: In 2013, a documentary film crew followed world-famous fire eater Tony "Volcano" Valenci on his quest to set a world record. This is his story.
title: Down in Flames: The True Story of Tony Volcano Valenci
plot_es: In 2013, a documentary film crew followed world-famous fire eater Tony "Volcano" Valenci on his quest to set a world record. This is his story.
original_name: Down in Flames: The True Story of Tony Volcano Valenci
plot_en: In 2013, a documentary film crew followed world-famous fire eater Tony "Volcano" Valenci on his quest to set a world record. This is his story.
